Myers, Hillsboro, Jacksonville, Kansas City, Miami, Oklahoma City, Pharr, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Pompano Beach, Richmond, Rogers, Salt Lake City, St. Louis, Tucson, Virginia Beach, Vineyard, and Waco markets). offers.offer_description: Unlimited play Monday through Friday open to 5 P.M. and weekends until noon, get 10% off food and non-alcoholic beverages plus you can bring five guests every visit.
offers.terms_conditions: Summer Fun Pass includes unlimited 2-hour game play sessions valid through 9/1/2025 on weekdays until 5:00 p.m. and weekends until 12:00 p.m. (local venue time). Non-refundable and non-transferable. Game play for up to six (6) people in one (1) bay. Valid for walk-in or join the waitlist requests. Not valid with reservations. Purchaser must be present at all times to use the pass. Anyone under 16 must be supervised by a Guest 21+ at all times. Valid at participating Topgolf US Venues only. Not valid at Topgolf Auburn Hills, Boise, Brooklyn Center, Canton, Des Moines, Mobile, Myrtle Beach, Panama City Beach, Ridgeland, Salt Lake City, Vineyard, Lounge, Swing Suite or Toptracer Range locations. Excludes arcade games. All passes will automatically convert to a complimentary Lifetime Membership after 9/2/2025 and must adhere to the applicable Membership Agreement Terms & Conditions.

offers.offer_description: Play for less than $20 per player each week in the 8-week Fall Leagues season, with three hours of game play every Monday.
offers.terms_conditions: Fall Leagues are not available at Topgolf Doral, Las Vegas, Miami Gardens, Pharr, Spring, Panama City Beach, and Avon. Pricing and dates may differ at some Topgolf venues. Players must be 18 or over to play in Topgolf Leagues. Cancellation requests for Leagues receive a full refund up to 48 hours prior to Leagues beginning, after which all payments are final. Refunds will be credited to your account within approximately 5-10 business days. If a League season is canceled by Topgolf for reasons outside of its control, a pro-rated refund for the portion of League play remaining will be administered to the designated Team Captain via a digital Topgolf Gift Card.
